stories.text:
This is a somewhat unorthodox post. I have been teaching people how to code on the web for over a decade and have built a student base of 100,000 eager students. As of late, I haven't had time to create tutorial videos any more.

I'm wondering if you (or anyone you know) are an excellent instructor? Ideally with a computer science background, job and teaching experience, and perhaps tutorial video creation experience.

If so, I'd like to team up with you and give you all of my students. Of course, I only want to offer this to someone who is deeply passionate about teaching, computer science, and real-world programming, and someone who cares deeply about our future programmers. If that's you let's get in touch!
stories.title: Are you or do you know any great coding tutors? I have 100k students for you
